#

This shiny package is an example shiny app created using the golem package and using shiny modules. 
It demonstrates many of the shiny techniques described in Hadley Wickham's [Mastering Shiny](https://mastering-shiny.org/)
book and [Engineering Production-grade Shiny Apps](https://engineering-shiny.org/) written by Colin Fay, SÃ©bastien Rochette, Vincent Guyader and Cervan Girad from [Thinkr](https://rtask.thinkr.fr/).
